title: The Unbearable Lightness of Scones
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: He tells me that a lot goes on in Lochgelly.

title: The Unbearable Lightness of Scones
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: You don't expect hairdressers to come from Lochgelly, for some reason, but there you are.

title: The Unbearable Lightness of Scones
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: He comes from Lochgelly, of all places.

title: Spare hours /
author: Brown, John
snippet: We drove up from Burntisland, and at Lochgelly he was full of memories of the saintly Seceder minister, Mr. Greig, and pointed out at Auchtertool the fatal meadow now lying in the sun, where Stuart of Dunearn shot Sir Alexander Boswell.
